# QIDI Q2 Firmware

[![QIDI RUSSIAN WIKI](https://img.shields.io/badge/QIDI%20RUSSIA%20WIKI-100000?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&labelColor=1b79ce&color=1668bd)](https://wiki.qidi-russia.ru/ru/Q2/)
[![QIDI WIKI](https://img.shields.io/badge/QIDI%20WIKI-100000?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&labelColor=1b79ce&color=1668bd)](https://wiki.qidi3d.com/en/Q2/)

## Download Instruction

> [!IMPORTANT]
> Before updating, please follow the instructions on the [official QIDI Q2 wiki](https://wiki.qidi3d.com/en/Q2/firmware-update).

> [!NOTE]
> Download the archive, rename the folder to `QD_Update` after extraction, and place it in the root directory of your USB device.
> Then connect the USB device to the printer to start the offline update.

---


## Changelog

### V1.1.0 - 2025/11/10

#### Firmware Link:

- [Download archive (133M)](https://github.com/kokoc26/qidi-q2-fw/releases/download/V1.1.0/Q2_V1.1.0.zip)

#### Changes:

  - Optimized the user experience of the multi-color box.
  - Fixed some bugs.


### V1.0.9 - 2025/10/27

#### Firmware Link:

- [Download archive (133M)](https://github.com/kokoc26/qidi-q2-fw/releases/download/V1.0.9/Q2_V1.0.9.zip)

#### Changes:

- Added support for QIDI BOX for Q2.QIDI BOX for Plus4 users need to use the new HUB designed for the Q2 to ensure compatibility.
